div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1177 Asia Minor, southern, Cilician-Pam- phylian border, before 1961 Burial: c. 480 B.C. Contents: 38 AR Zancle: 1 tetradr. Acanthus: 1 tetradr. Abdera: 1 octadr. Athens: 19 tetradr. Aegina: 10 didr. Pseudaeginetica: 1 didr. Corinth: 1 st. Parium: 1 dr. Chios: 1 didr. Unc. Caria: 1 double siglos Persia: 1 siglos Disposition: Oxford Robinson, NC 1961, pp. 107-17, illus.
